HuntingGameModeDescriptions.description:
Several <color=grey>gray</color> targets are flying
around the 360° screen. One target is marked <color=green>green</color> as target
target. The game is about visual scanning of the screen,
detecting the target target, and shooting it. When the target is
hit, the target turns to a <color=grey>gray</color> target and a new target is marked
<color=green>green</color>. Find and shot as many <color=green>green</color> targets as possible withing
60 sec. In an advanced mode, a time limit only gives you 2
secs to find a target, then the target target switches.

In <color=green>Easy Mode</color>, one target is marked <color=green>green</color> and all other targets are
<color=grey>gray</color>.

In <color=orange>Medium Mode</color>, one targets is marked <color=green>green</color>, three more targets are
<color=orange>orange</color> and all others are <color=grey>gray</color>.

In <color=red>Hard Mode</color>, five targets are in a different color (<color=green>green</color>, <color=red>red</color>,
<color=orange>orange</color>, <color=purple>purple</color>, <color=#A52A2A>gray</color>) all others a <color=grey>gray</color> and the voice command
gives the color code (English, machine voice) which color to
shoot
